author: Source: Stourbridgenews.co.uk
title: Owen sees sense in Klopp appointment at Liverpool - Stourbridgenews.co.uk
text:
Former Liverpool striker Michael Owen believes a hungry Jurgen Klopp would "be the best fit" to replace Brendan Rodgers at the Anfield helm. Klopp, formerly in charge of Borussia Dortmund, is favourite to become the new Reds manager after Rodgers was sacked following Sunday's 1-1 Merseyside derby draw - a move welcomed by Owen along with many other ex-players of the Premier League club.
 Stourbridgenews.co.uk.
